meanings.definition: A Chinese dish consisting of noodles stir-fried with vegetables and meat.
meanings.sent1: I ordered some delicious lomein for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves the best lomein in town.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to eat lomein with chopsticks but ended up with noodles everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling lomein filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lomein looked like a tasty rainbow on my plate.

meanings.definition: A type of wheat flour noodle commonly used in Chinese cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The grocery store had a sale on fresh lomein noodles.
meanings.sent2: The chef used lomein noodles to prepare the traditional dish.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the bag of lomein noodles, and they bounced all over the kitchen!
meanings.sent4: The long lomein noodles intertwined like a dance on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The steaming bowl of lomein noodles was a comforting sight on a cold day.
